title: Is hypnosis for sleep effective? - Quora

response.answer_text: While sleep hypnosis is generally considered harmless and may have mild benefits for some people as a supplementary sleep tool, there are more effective ways to get the sleep you need. Talk with your doctor to figure out what approach will be most helpful to you.
Hypnosis for insomnia is effective. It is essential to choose the right hypnotist who is experienced with dealing with this modality and you will see results.
